GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiShape class.

GetDocContent.name: GetDocContent
GetDocContent.description: Deprecated in 6.2. Returns the shape inner contents where a paragraph or text runs can be inserted.

GetContent.name: GetContent
GetContent.description: Returns the shape inner contents where a paragraph or text runs can be inserted.

SetVerticalTextAlign.name: SetVerticalTextAlign
SetVerticalTextAlign.description: Sets the vertical alignment to the shape content where a paragraph or text runs can be inserted.

params.name: VerticalAlign
params.description: The type of the vertical alignment for the shape inner contents.
